block.p: McMAHON-Margaret. June 27, 2000, in Buffalo, New York, age 87. Born November 19, 1912, in Fiume. Graduate Class of 1933 Hunter College, BA in Chemistry. Beloved wife of the late James E. McMahon. Mother of Gabrielle Jazwiecki, Christine Pike and the late Patricia McMahon. Mother-ln-law of Leonard Jazwiecki and Dennis Pike, and proud grandmother of James and Ryder Jazwiecki. Beloved sister of Charles Szekeley. Rest in peace. Viewing Thursday, June 29, at Beech-Tyne Funeral Home, 5541 Main St., Williamsville, NY. Funeral Mass St. Peter and St. Paul Church, Williamsville, June 30, at 9:30 AM.
